service.reconCarDesc: Discover our curated selection of pre-owned luxury vehicles. Each car in our inventory undergoes a rigorous inspection process to ensure it meets our exacting standards of quality and performance. Whether you need a car for a business trip, special occasion, or simply want to experience driving a luxury vehicle, we provide flexible rental options with exceptional service.
service.maintenanceDesc: Keep your luxury vehicle in peak condition with our comprehensive maintenance and service offerings. Our team of certified technicians specializes in high-end vehicles and uses only genuine parts and state-of-the-art diagnostic equipment. From routine maintenance to complex repairs, we ensure your car receives the care it deserves.

serviceDetails.reconCarDesc: Our reconditioned car service offers a carefully curated selection of pre-owned luxury vehicles that have undergone rigorous inspection and quality assurance processes. Each vehicle in our inventory is handpicked to meet our exacting standards.
serviceDetails.carRentalDesc: Our premium car rental service provides access to an extensive fleet of high-end vehicles for short-term use. Whether for business, special occasions, or simply experiencing luxury driving, we offer flexible rental options.
serviceDetails.maintenanceSubtitle: Keep Your Luxury Vehicle in Peak Condition
serviceDetails.maintenanceDesc: Our comprehensive maintenance and service offerings ensure your luxury vehicle receives the care it deserves. Our certified technicians specialize in high-end vehicles using genuine parts and state-of-the-art equipment.

about.storyText:
Vicar's story began in Penang 13 years ago with a clear goal: to make car buying honest and easy. In a market clouded by hidden costs and uncertainty, we built our business on trust‚Äîcharging only a fair 3% fee for every purchase, whether cash or loan. With the Vicar App, customers can now access the latest arrivals instantly, making car buying simple, transparent, and future-ready.

Our journey doesn't end with recon cars. Today, Vicar also offers car rental and professional servicing, giving customers a complete automotive experience. From purchase to aftercare, every step is guided by trust, transparency, and reliability.
about.missionText: To deliver premium mobility experiences through exceptional service, professional chauffeurs, high-quality vehicles, and seamless digital access.
about.visionText: To become Asia's most trusted and recognised premium mobility ecosystem ‚Äî connecting luxury travel, chauffeur services, and automotive ownership into one unified global brand.
about.tagline2: THAT'S THE KLASS WORTH [ KW ] PROMISE
about.gradientBar1: 99% Confidence, 99% of High Quality, 99% Transparency, 99% Satisfaction
about.whyChooseSubtitle: From selection to delivery, every part of our system is designed to make recon car buying simple, transparent, and reliable.
about.feature1Desc: Only carefully selected vehicles make it to our platform. Every car goes through a multi-point inspection before being listed.
about.feature2Desc: What you see is what you get. All listings include detailed specifications, true condition reports, and actual vehicle images.
about.feature3Desc: View, compare, and reserve vehicles instantly through our website or app. No guesswork. No pressure.
about.feature4Desc: All prices are upfront and honest. What you see is what you pay ‚Äî no surprises.
about.feature5Desc: We're here to help at every step ‚Äî online, offline, and even after you drive away.
about.feature6Desc: We don't just recondition. We restore value, trust, and long-term peace of mind.
about.ctaSubtitle: Explore our collection or get in touch with our team today. Your dream car awaits.
brandStory.introText: ViCAR delivers exceptional premium mobility experiences, combining luxury, innovation, and personalized service to create unforgettable journeys. Built on five core principles ‚Äî V ¬∑ i ¬∑ C ¬∑ A ¬∑ R ‚Äî our brand represents a steadfast commitment to excellence, quality, and unparalleled customer satisfaction in every journey we undertake together.
brandStory.vDescription: Vehicle represents our comprehensive automotive ecosystem. From today's innovations to tomorrow's mobility solutions, ViCAR continuously expands its service offerings to meet evolving transportation needs.
brandStory.vFooter: Vi symbolizes our deep integration across the entire automotive value chain and our commitment to continuous innovation.
brandStory.iDescription: The 'i' in ViCAR represents our Intelligent System ‚Äî a comprehensive platform where imported and reconditioned vehicles are seamlessly integrated through cutting-edge technology.
brandStory.iPoint1Text: Data-driven decisions guide our vehicle sourcing: which models to import, optimal pricing strategies, and configurations that meet market demand.
brandStory.iPoint2Text: From global sourcing ‚Üí import ‚Üí reconditioning ‚Üí listing ‚Üí sale ‚Üí mobility services ‚Äî everything operates within one unified ecosystem.
brandStory.iPoint3Text: We practice strategic importing, carefully analyzing market trends, cost structures, and customer preferences to deliver optimal value.
brandStory.iPoint4Text: Transforming traditional vehicle reconditioning into a modern, technology-driven mobility platform.
brandStory.cDescription: Care is our service foundation. Premium mobility extends beyond the vehicle ‚Äî it's about making you feel valued, understood, and truly looked after throughout your journey.
brandStory.cStandard2: Rigorous vehicle maintenance and safety protocols
brandStory.cStandard3: Real-time flight monitoring and proactive schedule adjustments
brandStory.cStandard4: Personalized service tailored to your preferences
brandStory.cStandard5: White-glove VIP service that feels like home
brandStory.cFooter: Care embodies our values: reliability, safety, and trustworthiness in every interaction.
brandStory.aDescription: Access connects you to premium mobility effortlessly. We empower you to travel on your terms ‚Äî anytime, anywhere, with complete control and flexibility.
brandStory.aFeature3: Seamless airport lounge and transfer services
brandStory.aFeature5: Dedicated corporate and business travel solutions
brandStory.rDescription: Ride defines our core experience. Every journey delivers smooth, refined, and reassuring comfort ‚Äî the hallmark of true luxury mobility.
brandStory.rFooter: Every Ride is a journey you'll trust and treasure.
brandStory.value1Desc: Every journey, every service, every vehicle ‚Äî all held to the highest premium standards.
brandStory.value2Desc: Rigorous training, comprehensive vehicle inspections, and VIP-level protocols ensure your complete peace of mind.
brandStory.value3Desc: Customer-centric service with thoughtful, personalized attention from pickup to destination.
brandStory.value4Desc: Seamless instant booking, transparent pricing, and intelligent mobility tools make premium travel effortless.
brandStory.value5Desc: Consistent, reliable, and professional in every interaction ‚Äî this is our commitment to you.
brandStory.subsidiary1: VIP airport transfers, private chauffeur, executive car services
brandStory.subsidiary5: Insurance & extended warranty solutions (ideal for KW99 customers)
brandStory.subsidiary6: Exclusive private tours, island hopping, Northern Malaysia experiences
brandStory.subsidiary7: Enterprise fleet solutions & dedicated driver management
brandStory.ctaSubtitle: Connect with our team today and discover how we elevate every journey.

townDetails.whatsAppMessage: Hello! I‚Äôd like to plan a city-to-city ride to {{place}}.
townDetails.whyTitle: Why travel with a private chauffeur?
townDetails.why.card1.title: Door-to-door comfort
townDetails.why.card1.desc: Skip transfers and waiting time. Enjoy a smooth ride from pickup to destination.
townDetails.why.card2.title: Flexible itinerary
townDetails.why.card2.desc: Add food stops, viewpoints, and breaks‚Äîyour trip follows your pace.
townDetails.why.card3.title: Reliable and safe
townDetails.why.card3.desc: Travel with professional chauffeurs and a premium fleet, with timing you can trust.
townDetails.towns.kualaLumpur.title: Kuala Lumpur
townDetails.towns.kualaLumpur.subtitle: Malaysia‚Äôs dynamic capital‚Äîiconic skylines, street food, and neighborhoods full of character.
townDetails.towns.kualaLumpur.descriptio: Kuala Lumpur pairs modern energy with rich cultural roots. Start your day at the Petronas Twin Towers, explore bustling markets and heritage streets, then finish with skyline views from a rooftop bar. From mega-malls to hidden kopitiams, KL rewards anyone who‚Äôs ready to wander.
townDetails.towns.kualaLumpur.highlights: Petronas Twin Towers & KLCC Park for skyline views and a relaxed stroll
Batu Caves‚Äîcolorful steps, limestone cliffs, and temple atmosphere
Bukit Bintang for shopping, nightlife, and city buzz
Jalan Alor for classic street food after dark
Merdeka Square & the Sultan Abdul Samad Building for history and architecture
townDetails.towns.kualaLumpur.tips: Go early for popular spots to beat crowds and heat
Bring a light jacket‚Äîmalls and trains can be chilly
Plan by zones (KLCC, Bukit Bintang, Chinatown) to save travel time
townDetails.towns.penang.title: Penang (George Town)
townDetails.towns.penang.subtitle: A UNESCO heritage city where street art, shophouses, and legendary hawker food meet the sea.
townDetails.towns.penang.description: Penang‚Äôs charm is in the details: pastel shophouses, temple courtyards, hidden caf√©s, and murals around every corner. In George Town, heritage and creativity sit side by side‚Äîperfect for slow walks, photo stops, and food hunts. Beyond town, hill views and coastal spots round out a great getaway.
townDetails.towns.penang.highlights: George Town heritage walk‚Äîshophouses, clan jetties, and street art
Penang Hill for cooler air and panoramic views
Kek Lok Si Temple‚Äîone of Malaysia‚Äôs most iconic temples
Gurney Drive for a seaside stroll and local bites
Hawker classics: char kway teow, asam laksa, nasi kandar
townDetails.towns.penang.tips: Wear comfortable shoes‚ÄîGeorge Town is best explored on foot
Try small portions so you can sample more hawker stalls
Late afternoon is ideal for photos when the light softens
townDetails.towns.johorBahru.title: Johor Bahru
townDetails.towns.johorBahru.subtitle: A lively gateway city with caf√©s, family attractions, and quick access to coastal escapes.
townDetails.towns.johorBahru.description: Johor Bahru is more than a stopover. Discover a growing caf√© scene, shopping, and family-friendly attractions, then branch out to nearby beaches for a slower pace. It‚Äôs a great pick for quick getaways and flexible city-to-coast itineraries.
townDetails.towns.johorBahru.highlights: Heritage streets for murals and local eats
A family day out at the city‚Äôs attractions
Caf√©-hopping‚ÄîJB‚Äôs specialty coffee scene is booming
Coastal side trips for sunsets and seafood
townDetails.towns.johorBahru.tips: Weekends can be busy‚Äîstart earlier for popular stops
Build in buffer time if you‚Äôre coordinating cross-border plans
A private ride is perfect for multi-stop caf√© and food routes
townDetails.towns.melaka.title: Melaka (Malacca)
townDetails.towns.melaka.subtitle: Riverside heritage, colonial landmarks, and Peranakan flavors in a charming walkable city.
townDetails.towns.melaka.description: Melaka feels like a living storybook‚Äîheritage streets, colorful trishaws, and centuries of culture layered into one compact destination. Explore Dutch-era squares, riverside caf√©s, and museums by day, then enjoy a relaxed evening by the river. It‚Äôs an easy favorite for day trips and weekends.
townDetails.towns.melaka.highlights: Jonker Street for antiques, snacks, and night market vibes
A riverside stroll or cruise along the Melaka River
Dutch Square and nearby museums for history and photos
Peranakan/nyonya favorites: chicken rice balls, cendol, laksa
townDetails.towns.melaka.tips: Visit late afternoon for cooler weather and evening lights
Weekdays feel calmer; weekends are lively and busy
Wear breathable clothing‚ÄîMelaka can be warm and humid
townDetails.towns.ipoh.title: Ipoh
townDetails.towns.ipoh.subtitle: A laid-back city known for old-town coffee, cave temples, and limestone landscapes.
townDetails.towns.ipoh.description: Ipoh blends nostalgia and nature. In Old Town, colonial buildings and classic kopitiams set the pace‚Äîperfect for slow mornings with white coffee and local pastries. Just outside the city, limestone hills hide beautiful cave temples and scenic viewpoints. It‚Äôs ideal for a relaxed getaway with great food and easy drives.
townDetails.towns.ipoh.highlights: Old Town stroll‚Äîheritage lanes, murals, and caf√©s
Local favorites: Ipoh white coffee, bean sprout chicken, salt-baked chicken
Cave temples and limestone scenery around town
Evening dessert runs: tau fu fah and local sweets
townDetails.towns.ipoh.tips: Start early for cave temples (cooler and less crowded)
Mix town stops with nature for the best day
Great for a 2D1N plan paired with nearby towns
townDetails.towns.langkawi.title: Langkawi
townDetails.towns.langkawi.subtitle: Island breezes, beach sunsets, and a slower pace‚Äîperfect for a reset weekend.
townDetails.towns.langkawi.description: Langkawi is made for slow days and golden evenings. Spend your time on beaches, viewpoints, and nature corners, then finish with a sunset by the shore. Whether you‚Äôre traveling as a couple, with friends, or with family, Langkawi makes it easy to unwind.
townDetails.towns.langkawi.highlights: Beach time and sunset spots along the coast
Seafood dinners and relaxed seaside caf√©s
townDetails.towns.langkawi.tips: Pack sunscreen and light layers for breezy evenings
Plan your day by area to cut down travel time
Keep evenings free‚Äîsunset is the daily highlight
townDetails.towns.kedah.title: Kedah
townDetails.towns.kedah.subtitle: Wide rice fields, small towns, and a calm northern rhythm‚Äîideal for scenic road trips.
townDetails.towns.kedah.description: Kedah offers a quieter, scenic side of Malaysia‚Äîopen landscapes, local markets, and northern hospitality. It‚Äôs great for unhurried road trips: drive through rice fields, stop for small-town breakfasts, and enjoy a slower pace. If you like authentic local moments, Kedah is a rewarding detour.
townDetails.towns.kedah.highlights: Scenic drives through rice field landscapes
Local markets for snacks, fruit, and handmade goods
Small-town food stops and traditional kopitiams
Easy road-trip access to other northern destinations
townDetails.towns.kedah.tips: Morning drives are best for cooler air and clearer skies
Keep your itinerary flexible‚Äîgreat finds are often unplanned
Perfect as part of a multi-state northern route
townDetails.towns.terengganu.title: Terengganu
townDetails.towns.terengganu.subtitle: East-coast beauty‚Äîcoastal roads, island vibes, and a strong tradition of local crafts.
townDetails.towns.terengganu.description: Terengganu is all about sea and tradition: long coastal drives, fresh seafood, and a pace that feels far from the city rush. It‚Äôs a great base for beach time, craft culture, and sunrise mornings by the water‚Äîespecially for an east-coast escape.
townDetails.towns.terengganu.highlights: Coastal drives with stops for beaches and viewpoints
townDetails.towns.terengganu.tips: Check seasonal weather if you‚Äôre planning island activities
Start early for long routes‚Äîscenic drives take time
Bring cash for smaller roadside stops and stalls
townDetails.towns.perak.title: Perak
townDetails.towns.perak.subtitle: Heritage towns, limestone hills, and nature stops‚Äîperfect for multi-stop road trips.
townDetails.towns.perak.description: Perak is a road trip dream: limestone scenery, heritage streets, and plenty of nature stops between towns. Whether you‚Äôre exploring caves, chasing lake views, or hunting for local food, Perak rewards travelers who love variety. It‚Äôs also an easy add-on for northbound routes.
townDetails.towns.perak.highlights: Heritage town walks and local caf√©s
Nature stops between destinations‚Äîideal for a multi-stop itinerary
Local specialties that change from town to town
townDetails.towns.perak.tips: Build a route with 2‚Äì3 stops for a smooth day
A private car helps you reach scenic areas with less hassle
Bring water‚Äîsome nature spots have limited facilities
townDetails.towns.perlis.title: Perlis
townDetails.towns.perlis.subtitle: Malaysia‚Äôs smallest state‚Äîquiet countryside views and a peaceful change of pace.
townDetails.towns.perlis.description: Perlis is calm and beautifully understated. It‚Äôs ideal for a quieter travel day‚Äîcountryside roads, slow meals, and laid-back scenery. Pair it with a northern route for a gentle reset and a different side of Malaysia.
townDetails.towns.perlis.highlights: A quiet, unhurried atmosphere for a true reset
townDetails.towns.perlis.tips: Best enjoyed as a relaxed stop on a northbound journey
Plan fuel and snack stops‚Äîsome areas are more rural
Great for early mornings and sunset drives
service.cityToCityDesc: A hassle-free option for long-distance travel with professional chauffeurs worldwide. Whether you're traveling between major cities or need a comfortable journey across regions, our city-to-city service ensures a seamless and luxurious experience. Our experienced drivers are well-versed in navigating various routes, ensuring you arrive at your destination safely and on time. Enjoy premium comfort, reliable service, and the convenience of door-to-door transportation for your intercity travels.
service.chauffeurHailingDesc: Experience the comfort of a classic chauffeur service, with the ease of booking and quick pickup. Our chauffeur hailing service combines traditional luxury with modern convenience, allowing you to request a professional driver at a moment's notice. Perfect for business meetings, special events, or when you simply want to travel in style. With our user-friendly booking system, you can arrange a ride quickly and efficiently, while our fleet of premium vehicles and trained chauffeurs guarantee a first-class experience from start to finish.
service.airportTransfersDesc: With extra waiting time and real-time flight monitoring for delays, we ensure smooth and effortless airport transfers. Our dedicated airport transfer service takes the stress out of travel by tracking your flight status and adjusting pickup times accordingly. Whether you're arriving or departing, our professional chauffeurs will be there to greet you, assist with your luggage, and provide a comfortable journey to or from the airport. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your transportation is handled with precision and care, allowing you to focus on your journey ahead.
service.hourlyFullDayHireDesc: Whether hourly or full-day chauffeur bookings, select from our customized services for maximum flexibility, comfort, and reliability. Perfect for business trips, city tours, shopping excursions, or special occasions, our flexible booking options adapt to your schedule. Choose from hourly rates for short trips or full-day packages for extended journeys. Our professional chauffeurs and premium vehicles are at your service, providing personalized attention and ensuring your comfort throughout the duration of your booking. Experience the freedom of having a dedicated driver at your disposal, ready to take you wherever you need to go.
